measure.CatchLine: Directs Department of Revenue to develop and implement program to award grants to local taxing jurisdictions to reimburse them for property tax expenditures incurred to encourage development and provision of affordable housing.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Directs Department of Revenue to develop and implement program to award grants to local taxing jurisdictions to reimburse them for property tax expenditures incurred to encourage development and provision of affordable housing. 
	Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to reimbursement for certain property tax expenditures; and prescribing an effective date.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to reimbursement for certain property tax expenditures; prescribing an effective date.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
Referred to Housing and Homelessness with subsequent referral to Revenue.
